pageUuid.description: Page unique identifier for this view inside the corresponding application

topology.description: Topology being represented by this view

applicationUuid.description: Application unique identifier for this view

x.description: X - Coordinate for this Node in the topology View

parentNodeId.description: Unique Id of the Node for ehich the custom properties are being represented

y.description: Y - Coordinate for this Node in the topology View

endPortSpeed.description: Interface port speed corresponding to end devices

startPortIpv4Mask.description: Interface port IPv4 mask corresponding to start devices

endPortIpv4Address.description: Interface port IPv4 address corresponding to end devices

endPortName.description: Interface port name corresponding to end devices

startPortIpv4Address.description: Interface port IPv4 address corresponding to start devices

startPortID.description: Device port ID corresponding to start devices

startPortSpeed.description: Interface port speed corresponding to start devices

startPortName.description: Interface port name corresponding to start devices

target.description: Device ID corresponding to the target device

source.description: Device ID correspondng to the source device

endPortID.description: Device port ID corresponding to end devices

endPortIpv4Mask.description: Interface port IPv4 mask corresponding to end devices

applicationUuid.description: Application unique identifier for this Page

aclApplied.description: Indicates if the ACL that is applied on the device

greyOut.description: Indicates if the device is active for this topology view

tags.description: List of tags applied on this device

x.description: X position of the device on the displayed topology view

roleSource.description: Indicates whether role is assigned manually or automatically

family.description: Product family which is part of the product identifier

dataPathId.description: ID of the path between devices

fixed.description: Indication of whether the position is fixed or will use auto layout

y.description: Y position of the device on the displayed topology view
